attributes.title: Don't Do This - #0.999
attributes.caption: The AH Crew send off the final test episode of Off-Topic by getting all nostalgic and reminiscing about all of the things they set on fire as kids, and about their early days with the company.
attributes.description: The AH Crew send off the final test episode of Off-Topic by getting all nostalgic and reminiscing about all of the things they set on fire as kids, and about their early days with the company.

attributes.title: Razors n' Tasers - #0.3
attributes.caption: AH Discusses Extra Life
attributes.description: Join Michael Jones, Lindsay Jones, Trevor Collins and Matt Bragg as they discuss Extra Life, Cloudberry Kingdom, Lindsay's RT job interview and more on this episode of Off Topic! This episode episode originally aired on November 13, 2015.

attributes.title: Mountain Monsters - #0.1
attributes.caption: AH Discusses Mountain Monsters
attributes.description: Join Michael Jones, Geoff Ramsey, Jack Pattillo and Jeremy Dooley as they discuss AdBlock, Ghostbusters, and the hit TV show Mountain Monsters on the premiere episode of Off Topic! This episode episode originally aired on October 30, 2015.

attributes.title: Creative Director, Here - #0.2
attributes.caption: AH Discusses Promotions
attributes.description: Join Michael Jones, Geoff Ramsey, Gavin Free and Ryan Haywood as they discuss Promotions, Parenting, and Call of Duty on this episode of Off Topic! This episode originally aired on November 6, 2015.

attributes.title: Still No Shirt - #1
attributes.caption: In this premiere episode of Off Topic, the AH Crew sits down to talk about how Jeremy hasn't seen any movies, how to properly pronounce "Risinger" and how the logo for a certain youtube channel bears a striking resemblance to the symbol of a certain fasci
attributes.description: In this premiere episode of Off Topic, the AH Crew sits down to talk about how Jeremy hasn't seen any movies, how to properly pronounce "Risinger" and how the logo for a certain youtube channel bears a striking resemblance to the symbol of a certain fascist regime. This episode originally aired December 4, 2015.

attributes.title: If Your Pee Could Cure Cancer - #2
attributes.caption: AH Discusses Urine
attributes.description: This episode originally aired December 11, 2015. The AH Crew sits down to talk about The Walking Dead, missing Xboxes and Cancer-curing urine and more on this week's Off Topic!

attributes.title: Blow-tergeist - #3
attributes.caption: AH Discusses Ghosts
attributes.description: Description: This episode originally aired December 18, 2015 and is sponsored by Audible and Lazer Team The AH Crew sits down to talk about Star Wars, how to sexually satisfy a ghost and more on this week's Off Topic!

attributes.title: The Trouble with Jack's Pants - #4
attributes.caption: AH Discusses The LA Pool Scene
attributes.description: This episode originally aired December 25, 2015 and is sponsored by Audible and Lazer Team.The AH Crew sits down to talk about making a scene at an L.A. pool and the trouble with Jack's pants and more on this week's Off Topic!
